INSERT INTO results
ROW_ID, C_DT, UP_DT, C_ID, PID, PROD_ID, PROD_NAME, BOOL, VALUE, FLG, STATAND_LV, STATAND, STATAND_VA, REL_ID, INBZ_T, CM_T, WD, SD, BU_ID,
